title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 vs Dell Latitude 7430: Which is better?
content:
With the introduction of Intel’s 12th-generation Core processors, we’ve seen a ton of great laptops hit the market. One particular segment that’s been suddenly flooded with options us business, and there are a lot of fantastic business laptops to choose from in 2022, including some convertibles. Among those convertibles, we have the iconic Lenovo ThinkPad

The post Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen 7 vs Dell Latitude 7430: Which is better? appeared first on XDA.
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga and the Dell Latitude 7430 are two great business laptops, but which one is right for you? Let's take a look.
